channel.title: blog on Drea Cole | Designed by Drea
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Drea Cole | Designed by Drea

item.title: Bali-inspired DIY Floating Brunch
item.description: You may have seen them on social media… …..gorgeous photos of travelers enjoying a ‘floating brunch’ at a luxury resort in Bali or Thailand.

item.title: Before and After Decorating with Plants
item.description: I’ve never had much luck with house plants… But our new home has a bright open floorplan AND a courtyard (yaasss!

item.title: Boss Guacamole!
item.description: You need this sassy guacamole in your life. It’s spicy with a little attitude and has just the right amount of texture.

item.title: Custom Restoration Hardware-inspired bed for way less
item.description: I was obsessed with the clean lines and extra tall headboard of Restoration Hardware’s Lawson bed for the owner’s suite in our newly built home.

item.title: Easy Options for Kids DIY Breakfast
item.description: My husband and I both have IT jobs and work from home, so our days already consist of trying to get things done in between a ton of meetings that start bright and early.

item.title: House Tour - Coming Soon
item.description: House tour coming soon! Subscribe to get notified once it’s available.

item.title: Shortcut Cocktail - The Bellini
item.description: It was the last weekend of our 2-week holiday break and I knew Monday was going to be rough.

item.title: Shortcut Cocktail - The Caipirinha
item.description: If you haven’t already experienced the sweet bliss of a Caipirinha (heeeeey kai-purr-reen-yah - ‘aight), I highly recommend it.
